Rafael Felipe Veiga Saracchini

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/6563061138715255
  • Última atualização do currículo em 06/08/2013

Rafael is a PhD student at the State University of Campinas - Unicamp (Campinas, Brazil). He obtained his Bsc. in Federal Fluminense University (Niteroi, Brazil) in end of 2005, being invited to start his PhD studies in Unicamp in 2007. Since 2003 he works with gauge-based photometric stereo methods to recover information such as surface inclination from digital images and published few papers and posters in this area. His research interest areas are three dimensional data recovery through digital images using Geometric and Photometric Stereo and aims to develop and improve robust methods to recover tridimensional data in non Lambertian surfaces like human skin and glossy/specular surfaces. Acctually he is in Instituto Tecnológico de Castilla y León (ITCL), at Burgos,Spain, and is investigating the usage of computer vision approaches to the development of assisted living devices and markerless augmented reality. (Texto informado pelo autor)
